Package robot

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommListener
    Listener is the outer class of everything
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Communicator
    Communicator takes care of the communication between the NXT and the PC part by using bluetooth connection Based on the Original Communicator by professor Glassy
    Controller
    Main controller of the NXT brick, it will take in the message sent by the PC via bluetooth, put it in queue, pop it and execute it Listener template from professor Glassy
    Detector
    This class will take care of the Touchsensor and reponse back to the controller whether the Touchsensor is touched.
    Locator
    Locator is just a locator :)
    Message
    All of the messages used to communicate between PC and NXT
    Scanner
    Scanner takes care of the Light Value for the bearings and Ultrasonic value, or the Echo Distance to the wall or objects.
    VariancePose  
    VariancePoseProvider  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MessageType
    Message between robot and PC
